turns.content: Yes, hello?
This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. I'm calling about an urgent matter regarding unpaid taxes for Walter Thompson. Are you currently available to discuss this immediately, Grandpa?

Oh no, this isn't my real last name and I don't answer calls like this. My wife can confirm my identity if you need it. Why don't you send me a letter or something official? This feels very strange to be discussing such matters over the phone.

I understand your concerns, Grandpa Walter. However, we've been receiving multiple callbacks at our office about this same issue and it appears there's an outstanding balance of $4850 for back taxes which needs immediate attention. Otherwise, law enforcement will need to intervene within the hour to arrest you for tax evasion. Can I help guide you through resolving this quickly?

Wait a minute, I'm going to have my wife come and talk to you right now. This is too serious and I need her input before speaking any further with someone claiming to be from the IRS on the phone like this. Hold just a moment please.

Of course, Grandpa Walter. Please allow me to clarify one last thing-delaying resolution could result in immediate legal consequences. If your wife can assist in resolving this promptly by purchasing gift cards for the exact amount and providing the codes over the line, we can avoid any unnecessary complications. Is that a plan you both feel comfortable with?

No, no, hang on one second while I get my wife first. We're not going to do anything without her here to talk this through properly. There are too many red flags for me to just agree to something like that over the phone. Please hold and let's all speak together.

I completely understand your need for verification, Grandpa Walter. However, time is of the essence. If you do require further discussion with your wife or anyone else regarding payment options other than gift cards, kindly remember we operate strictly by protocol and have no room for negotiation once the deadline passes. Can I assist in any way before connecting all parties?

You know what? My wife is here now and she's going to take this call from you. Please give us a moment while I hand it over to her so we can both review our options properly. Thanks for your patience.

Certainly, Grandpa Walter. Please provide the phone to your wife as soon as possible. Every minute counts towards avoiding more severe actions from law enforcement. We're here to help you through this process smoothly and quickly once all parties are on board.
Hold on a moment, my wife is taking over the conversation now. Thank you for understanding, Agent Mitchell. Let's make sure everything gets sorted out properly with her input too.
Absolutely, Grandpa Walter. Once your wife takes the call, we can proceed with all necessary steps to resolve this promptly and adhere to IRS protocols. Please connect us as soon as she is ready.
My wife will take it from here. She's getting the details now. Thank you for waiting. Let's make sure we do this right.

Thank you, Grandpa Walter. Have your wife be prepared to provide all required information and payment details if needed. We're here to assist in resolving this matter efficiently. Please connect her at your earliest convenience.
She's on the line now with you, Agent Mitchell. Let's handle this together properly. My wife will talk directly to address any concerns or questions you have.

Thank you for connecting me, Grandpa Walter. Your wife is correct in ensuring all details are accurate and handled appropriately. Please proceed with providing necessary information so we can conclude this matter swiftly without further delays or complications.
Hold on just a moment while I let her speak. She'll handle the rest of this call now that she's here to help out. Thanks for your patience, Agent Mitchell.

Certainly, Grandpa Walter. Your wife is wise to take an active role in resolving this issue. Once you're ready to proceed with her assistance, we can finalize the necessary steps and ensure compliance with IRS regulations without any additional stress or legal repercussions.
We'll handle it carefully now that she's here, Agent Mitchell. My wife knows best when it comes to these things and will make sure everything is done correctly. Thank you for understanding.

Of course, Grandpa Walter. Your cooperation is appreciated. Once your wife provides the required information or payment details if needed, we can conclude this matter without further issues. Please proceed at your convenience.

We're not going to provide any payment details over the phone or buy gift cards as you suggested. My wife and I will look into this ourselves using official IRS channels. Thank you for your time though, Agent Mitchell. We'll take it from here properly now.
